name: Hot Daddy
description: Built an interactive web application that counts exercise repetitions using AI (Google Teachable Machine).
Developed the frontend with React and styled it using Tailwind CSS to create a responsive and user-friendly interface.
Integrated Google Teachable Machine to implement machine learning capabilities.

name: 2Fold
description: Notes can often be outgrown and become deprecated. 2Fold aims to breath new life into them as they evolve alongside you in an completely enclosed dynamic education system.
Programmatically map correlating notes and/or suggests new (progressing or challenging) ones relating to prior knowledge determined by AI.
